projects.name: Logos
projects.description: A collection of brand identities and logo designs created for various clients and personal projects. Each logo represents a unique visual identity crafted to capture the essence of the brand.

projects.name: Random Designs
projects.description: An eclectic mix of experimental design work, illustrations, and creative explorations. This collection showcases versatility and creative freedom across various design disciplines.

projects.name: Sugar Packaging
projects.description: Product packaging design for a sugar brand, featuring label design, typography, and visual branding. This project demonstrates attention to consumer packaging and brand consistency.

projects.name: Nomad Magazine
projects.description: Editorial design for a nomad travel magazine, featuring layout design, typography, photography curation, and visual storytelling. This project focuses on capturing the spirit of travel, freedom, and life on the road while keeping a consistent and readable magazine style.

projects.name: Spotify Podcast Album Cover
projects.description: Podcast album cover artwork designed for Spotify, focusing on bold visuals and mood-driven typography to match the musicâ€™s vibe.

projects.name: Mural Designs
projects.description: A collection of experimental mural designs exploring bold shapes, colors, and large-scale visual impact across different spaces.

projects.name: Graffiti Art
projects.description: A series of graffiti artworks exploring lettering, street-style visuals, and expressive color work inspired by urban environments.

projects.name: Lotus Spa
projects.description: Luxury branding and visual design for a high-end lotus-inspired spa, focusing on elegant typography, soft color palettes, and a calm, refined atmosphere.

projects.name: Wonders Of The Universe Magazine
projects.description: Magazine design focused on imaginative creature concepts, blending surreal illustrations with editorial layouts inspired by the mysteries of the universe.
